Reviews.Title: Unfortunately, deffective cell phone.
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: This a beautiful cell phone, until you use it. I was very disappointed with this purchase: It is advertised as an unlocked, GSM phone, but,  on the drop down screen,  it said "NO SIM CARD", even with my US T-Mobile, 4g card installed. I don't understand that. Although, I could make a call, but, could hardly hear person talking, unless set on speaker or use Bluetooth. Not good. Tried to install apps from Play Store, or a You Tube update, but, it wouldn't respond, or it would take over 15 minutes and still would not completely download, and used a lot of battery to do it. It used up the battery too quickly, and took a long time to recharge. It did say "Galaxy S 4 Mini", but it appears to be a bit larger and different design than the mini S 3&4,s  I've seen on Amazon, lately. Possibly an Samsung Ace? Due to the poor performance of this cell phone, I am requesting a return w/refund.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: dante johnson
Reviews.Content: Only had the phone a few weeks and suddenly the screen went white and also it was hard to hear while on the phone

Reviews.Title: works like a galaxy
Reviews.Author: ABU KOROMA
Reviews.Content: This phone operates similar things that an iphone or galaxy does. It downloads a variety of apps like facebook, skype, weather, whatsapp, viber, and so on. Most important, it works international. You just need to buy a sim card for a particular country and you can communicate with the rest of the world. The camera is superb, can video a whole two-hours event. It also has dual ports for two sims. Charging last long.

ProductInfo.Features:
4.0" android 2.3 OS (Android 4.0 UI) smart phone
dual sim cards dual standby Works with GSM carriers,pls notice,this phone supports 2G GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz,it doesnot support 3G 4G network sim card,pls pay attention on it.
built in WIFI dual camera
Band GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz Sim Card Dual SIM Card Dual Standby,PLS NOTICE it is 2G mobile phone,not work with 3G and 4G network sim card.
Powerfull SC6820 1ghz CPU 512MB ROM + 256MB RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Eson® Quadband 2 Sim Card with Android 2.3 Os (Android 4.1 Ui) Smart Phone 4.0 Inch Capacitive Touch Screen T-mobile Simple Mobile (Black)
